text:
Accenture Federal Services | www.accenturefederal.com | ONSITE | Full-Time |https://www.accenture.com/us-en/careers/jobsearch?keyword=fe...

Must have Defense Government Contract experience for each opening.

Accenture Federal Services Company, is a leading solutions integrator focused on using information and technology to solve real world problems for the Federal government.

Multiple positions listed below: LOCATION: Reston, VA | Federal Cloud Engineer/LINUX https://www.accenture.com/us-en/careers/jobdetails?id=004130...

LOCATION: Chantilly, VA | Software Engineer https://www.accenture.com/us-en/careers/jobdetails?id=003797...

LOCATION: Reston VA | Federal DevOps Engineer https://www.accenture.com/us-en/careers/jobdetails?id=004450...

Please contact dana.mclee-mcdavid@accenturefederal.com for more details.
